author: gartung
body:
After many tests the final solution to the segfaults when running stack traces appears to be enabling OneDNN memory debug in Tensorflow. Setting this option disables some "features" of OneDNN stack tracing
https://github.com/oneapi-src/oneDNN/blob/1e3bc8d0b92e845a186bf0c23eccee187eb5eb81/src/cpu/x64/jit_generator.hpp#L296
title: Enable OneDNN memory debug in Tensorflow
